summary: I have a deep understanding of the 21st century marketing landscape including various online components which have radically changed the way consumers learn and respond to marketing.Having learned first hand the challenges and opportunities available from the web, I offer full-spectrum solutions to the challenges businesses face today.  I apply various online capabilities like Search Engine Marketing, Search Engine Optimization, Lead Generation and Conversion Testing to meet the goals of  creating more traffic, conversions and revenue.My unique ability lies in being able to see and convey strategies to all levels of understanding in a non-aggressive, safe and patient manner.CausesUpgrading the current educational system, green initiatives, empowering people and businessesValues StatementsI am an intelligent, passionate caring person who seeks out the best in every situationI am a loving husband who provides for my familyI provide a principle based example for my childrenI value integrity and empathy in my personal relationshipsI strive to do well by doing goodI hold sacred a trust I have been givenI will use my positive side to guide my decisionsI will provide unconditional support to those in needI will be truthful and honest at all timesI will make time for the things that bring me joyI will strive for personal fitness and healthy livingSpecialties: Online and Search Marketing, Behavioral Marketing, Healthcare Consulting, Marketing Strategy and New Business Development
